summary: Adds ALL of the shouts in all the dlc!
descriptionHtml:
Adds ALL of the shouts in all the dlc! if it says an error after activating like "XX0283948 is missing" or something like that, it means that you probably don't have the dlc the shout is from.
[font=Times New Roman][size=3]
[/size][/font][b][font=Times New Roman][size=3]To activate the mod open console and type in "bat allshoutsget"
[/size][/font][b][font=Times New Roman][size=3]To deactivate the mod open console and type in "bat allshoutsremove"[/size][/font][/b]
[u]

ENJOY THE MOD!!!
[/u][/b]
author: IMTHEKILLER360
